title: Sommer Sport Pack
description:
Beach Volleyball: Slap on the sun block and head to the beach for this game! 8 Exotic locations from Brazil to Japan. 32 male and 32 female teams    from around the world. Smooth animated moves and stunning 3D graphics.    Multiplayer mode.

Beach Soccer: Set for its first appearance in 2008 at the Olympics, try out this great sport game! 8 great world locations, 320 unique players from 32 international teams, golden goal and penalty shoot-outs, multiplayer mode.

Body Boarding: Ride the waves 360 degrees with Mike Stewart, as you hit the surf in locations such as Hawaii and Tahiti!! 8 Characters, with hidden bonus characters as well plus 8 different body boards to choose from. With 15 tricks to master, the 3D effects of waves, water splashing ripples and spray means to will almost smell the sea!!

5-a-Side Football: Head down to the park for some great football fun!! 32 teams with unique players, eight different locations, with spectacular 3D motion capturing.

Scooter Challenge: From Trafalgar Square in London to the Olympic stadium in Berlin, race your scooter in exciting world wide locations!! With training, single race and championship modes, and a variety of weather conditions, and multiplayer action.
